data.text:
Addressing climate change is up to all of us.
On #SustainableSunday & everyday be part of the solution: https://t.co/uE8W7SyBk4 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/Nk3aZ5KgxA

How does sustainable development look via your lens?
Take 📸 of #GlobalGoals, enter #SDGsPhotoCon2017 & share it w/🌍: https://t.co/KypKgBpNvZ https://t.co/eX5VWbztrY
Check out recent highlights from Afghanistan, NYC, Mali + more in this new @UN_photo gallery: https://t.co/M6ASzOTHCa https://t.co/n66d4qgVYs

"Disarmament is all about preventing major catastrophes in times of conflict" –
 @UN_Disarmament chief https://t.co/354E9QjOkr https://t.co/KM8Fzxaqe7

🍎🍍No Poverty
🖊️📔Quality Education 

Japanese performer Pikotaro is helping draw attention to #globalgoals. 

Info: https://t.co/2xdwF0H7WV https://t.co/JpuMoXV7m7
Rapid deployment, increasing # of women peacekeepers + conduct & discipline discussed at @UNPeacekeeping mtg this wk https://t.co/5YB9a2uOmJ https://t.co/RBVdvictRw
See ways to help refugees & migrants, support food delivery in crises, protect cultural heritage + more https://t.co/db4jSU1II4 https://t.co/QKu6TZApp7
ICYMI: New @WHO chief took office this week. He has outlined his vision here: https://t.co/DZPWG7C6Bd https://t.co/bWbqrOeJJd
.@UN_Women says coops create economic opportunities. Meet women from Guinea doing just that: https://t.co/kUhyOH4THV https://t.co/857aZEfiyI

The Young Professionals Programme is now open for applications until 22 August 2017. Details are here: https://t.co/yBgBGT8Sqf https://t.co/RJv7j9peqx
Thank you to all countries who commit troops & services to @UNPeacekeeping. See: https://t.co/bi91lbpk37 https://t.co/n718ljnDs9
Have a story about people who had to leave their homes for a better life? Global Migration Film Festival is your chance to share it w/ the 🌎 https://t.co/CR3vjXobvU
.@IntlCrimCourt fights impunity, prosecutes perpetrators of war crimes, genocide & crimes against humanity https://t.co/STlOodrRX5 https://t.co/9bRMMxCfXq

Millions are forcibly displaced b/c of persecution, conflict, violence & human rights violations.
Time to act is NOW https://t.co/5tGesFO2Ts https://t.co/3Z1LNnkJ7S
New treaty is an important step towards world without nuclear weapons – @UN_Spokesperson statement is here: https://t.co/MKULVNisHZ https://t.co/lgy4RCXoSI
Dreams for democracy cannot be killed by violence & oppression – @AntonioGuterres says @IntlCrimCourt is key to ending impunity https://t.co/cmnPIYS1US

Starting now: High-level event on Human Security and its Contribution to Agenda 2030. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf #GlobalGoals

As Chiefs of Defence meet in NYC, @UNPeacekeeping chief Jean-Pierre Lacroix explains why it is key to #investinginpeace. https://t.co/ci4U3jElpl

 @Diane_Corner explains her work in Central African Republic. https://t.co/68HfUVT2M8

#ZeroHunger is more than just a possibility ➡️ https://t.co/nlUtZ49kAp https://t.co/plRDZYxQX7

20 ppl are newly displaced every min of the day.

UNHCR says Libya is now the top departure country for refugees + migrants. It's also the deadliest route to Europe. https://t.co/ViMfBEMdxH
